verses.name: Ruth 1:19
verses.text: So they two went until they came to Beth–lehem. And it came to pass, when they were come to Beth–lehem, that all the city was moved about them, and they said, Is this Naomi?

verses.name: Ruth 1:20
verses.text: And she said unto them, Call me not Naomi, call me Mara: for the Almighty hath dealt very bitterly with me.

verses.name: Ruth 1:21
verses.text: I went out full, and the Lord hath brought me home again empty: why then call ye me Naomi, seeing the Lord hath testified against me, and the Almighty hath afflicted me?
